duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and build business relationships with contract clients and non-contract clients.
Conduct regular business IT meetings with clients and make technology recommendations.
Propose, design, and quote projects of different scopes.
Track project milestones and deliverables, ensuring they meet client's needs.
Coordinate the support team and contractors involved in client support.
Develop and deliver managed services, progress reports, proposals, and presentations.
Resolve client satisfaction issues and represent the company at trade shows and events.
Follow up on sales leads and manage account development.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of a Microsoft MCP, Cisco CENT, Network+ or equivalent industry certification
